attributes.additional_details: Minimal people still watch live TV with the majority using streaming. If the BBC want income then introduce adverts.
attributes.background: The TV licence needs to be discontinued. In this day and age it is no longer needed. The general consensus of the general public is that it is a waste of peoples money and in fact robbery.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Scrap the TV Licence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/754524
